# vfs_issynchronous

**Function**

Determine if writes to a filesystem occur synchronously.

## Declaration

```swift
int vfs_issynchronous(mount_t mp);
```

## Parameters

- **mp**: Mount to test.

## Return Value

Nonzero if writes occur synchronously, else 0.
title: vfs_issynchronous
